sentences.en: "His memory must be completely back, then?" — "Just about."
sentences.cn: “这么说，他的记忆一定是完全恢复了？”——“差不多。”

sentences.en: "Welcome back" was all they said. I could have kissed them!
sentences.cn: 他们只是说，“欢迎回来。”我真想亲他们一下！

sentences.en: a back-to-front baseball cap.
sentences.cn: 前后颠倒的棒球帽。

sentences.en: a T-shirt with a picture of a snake on the back
sentences.cn: 后背印了一条蛇的T恤衫

sentences.en: back in the day, he'd had one of the greatest minds I'd ever come across.
sentences.cn: 从前他曾是我所遇到过的最有头脑的人之一。

sentences.en: Carla made fun of him behind his back.
sentences.cn: 卡拉在他背后取笑他。

sentences.en: dad demolished an old shed in back of his barn.
sentences.cn: 父亲拆掉了仓库后面的一个旧棚。

sentences.en: Dave pulled a back muscle and could barely kick the ball.
sentences.cn: 戴夫背部拉伤，几乎没法踢球。

sentences.en: he kissed her quickly, when the landlady's back was turned.
sentences.cn: 趁女房东注意别的地方的时候，他很快地吻了她一下。

sentences.en: He ordered them to stack up pillows behind his back.
sentences.cn: 他命令他们把几个枕头叠放在自己的背后。

sentences.en: He pushed her away and she fell back on the wooden bench.
sentences.cn: 他把她推开，然后她向后跌坐在长木椅上。

sentences.en: He took off at once and headed back to the motel.
sentences.cn: 他立刻离开，回到汽车旅馆。

sentences.en: He was back home by half past eleven.
sentences.cn: 他是11点半之前回家的。

sentences.en: His long, uncovered hair flew back in the wind.
sentences.cn: 他那露在外面的长发随风向后飞舞。

sentences.en: I felt a sharp pain in my lower back.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到后腰一阵剧痛。

sentences.en: I gave her a lift back out to her house.
sentences.cn: 我让她搭我的便车回家。

sentences.en: I’ll be back in a minute.
sentences.cn: 我马上回来。

sentences.en: I'll report back the moment I have located him.
sentences.cn: 我一找到他就马上汇报。

sentences.en: If you love life, life will love you back.
sentences.cn: 热爱生活，生活也会厚爱你。

sentences.en: It’s possible to travel there and back in a day.
sentences.cn: 到那里一天来回是可以的。

sentences.en: Kirov stepped back a pace.
sentences.cn: 基洛夫往后退了一步。

sentences.en: Put that book back where you found it!
sentences.cn: 把那本书放回原处！

sentences.en: Rumours of financial scandals have come bubbling back to the surface.
sentences.cn: 有关财务丑闻的谣言接连不断地冒出来。

sentences.en: she had a little nagging worry at the back her mind.
sentences.cn: 下意识里她还存有顾虑。

sentences.en: She stepped back from the door expectantly.
sentences.cn: 她充满期待地从门口往后退。

sentences.en: Southbound traffic tailed back for twenty miles on the M5 near Bristol.
sentences.cn: 在布里斯托尔附近的5号高速公路上，南行的车辆排成了绵延20英里的长龙。

sentences.en: The community's links with Syria date back to biblical times.
sentences.cn: 这个团体与叙利亚的关系可以追溯到《圣经》时代。

sentences.en: the exhausts had been fitted back to front.
sentences.cn: 排气管前后装倒了。

sentences.en: The rescuers were beaten back by strong winds and currents.
sentences.cn: 救援人员因风浪太大而被迫中断工作。

sentences.en: We'll go to a meeting in Birmingham and come straight back.
sentences.cn: 我们将去伯明翰参加会议，然后马上回来。

sentences.en: 英文例句: I’ll be back in a minute.
sentences.cn: 中文例句:我马上回来。

words.tran_cn: 无背的；无靠背的；无后盾的
向后的；反向的；发展迟缓的
支持；使后退（back的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 在…背后，支持；在…的后面；在…的后部
下错了赌注；做错了选择
v. 支持，援助；（资料）备份；倒退；裱

phrases.phrase: know something like the back of one's hand

phrases.tran_cn: 在背上；找我麻烦，挑我毛病

trans.tran_cn: 后面的，过去的，拖欠的，舌根的
trans.tran_en: at or in the back of something

trans.tran_cn: 向后，在后面，回到原处，恢复原状，回到以前的地方，回复，取回，追溯至，再次，离开
trans.tran_en: in, into, or to the place or position where someone or something was before

trans.tran_cn: 背部，脊柱，后面，背面，靠背，末尾，后卫
trans.tran_en: the part of something that is furthest from the front

trans.tran_cn: 资助，支持，（使）后退，下赌注，伴奏，伴唱，在…后面，给…加背衬
trans.tran_en: If you move back, you move in the opposite direction to the one in which you are facing or in which you were moving before
